Box Tutorials
This documentation page is deprecated since OpenViBE 0.12.0 (oct 2011), and won't be maintained. The new page can be found here .

You will find all the box tutorials scenarios in share/openvibe-scenarios/box-tutorials .

This folder contains simple scenarios, widely commented. Each one shows how to design with the provided boxes a basic processing pipeline. Here is a complete listing of these box-tutorials, ordered alphabetically:

  • channel-selector.xml: shows how to select a specific subset of channels in an EEG signal stream.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_ChannelSelector
  • crop.xml: shows how to crop an input signal in a defined amplitude range.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_Crop
  • gdf-reader.xml: shows how to read recorded data in GDF format.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_GDFFileReader
  • generic-stream-reader.xml: shows how to read recorded data in OpenViBE generic format.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_GenericStreamReader
  • lua-stimulator.xml: shows how to process stimulations using the LUA script language.
    Featured boxes: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_LuaStimulator , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_KeyboardStimulator
  • network-acquisition.xml: shows how to acquire real-time EEG signal. Please note that this scenario can be used only with the Acquisition Server runnning in background.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_AcquisitionClient
  • power-spectrum.xml: shows how to perform a spectral analyis and display the power spectrum
    Featured boxes: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_TimeBasedEpoching , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SpectralAnalysisGPL , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_PowerSpectrumDisplay
  • run-command.xml: shows how to execute system commands directly with OpenViBE.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_RunCommand
  • signal-display.xml: shows how to display signal in a visualization window.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SignalDisplay
  • simple-dsp.xml: shows how to perform mathematical and logic computations on.
    Featured box: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SimpleDSP
  • sound-player.xml: shows how to play a sound in OpenViBE.
    Featured boxes: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SoundPlayer , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_KeyboardStimulator
  • time-frequency-map.xml: shows how to perform a spectral analysis and display the time-frequency map.
    Featured boxes: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SpatialFilter , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_TimeBasedEpoching , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SpectralAnalysisGPL , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_TimeFrequencyMapDisplay
  • topographic-map.xml: shows how to display 2d and 3D topographic maps.
    Featured boxes: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_TimeBasedEpoching , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_EpochAverage , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_ElectrodeLocalisationFileReader , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_2DTopographicMap , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_3DTopographicMap
  • voxel-display.xml: shows how to display reconstructed brain activity through inverse model and voxel visualizer.
    Featured boxes: Doc_BoxAlgorithm_TimeBasedEpoching , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_EpochAverage , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_SpatialFilter , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_2DTopographicMap , Doc_BoxAlgorithm_VoxelDisplay
